Unlock the secrets of the mysterious fairy realm in Dream Chronicles: The Chosen Child, the third installment of the award-winning Dream ChroniclesÃ¢â€Â¬Ã‚Â« series. Discover hidden clues and solve unique, challenging puzzles as you join Faye on her quest to save her daughter from the clutches of cruel Fairy Queen Lilith. Reveal the secret prophecy of The Chosen Child in this all-new hidden object adventure with truly immersive gameplay and unexpected twists. Dream Chronicles 3 features fabulous Art Nouveau inspired backgrounds in higher resolution with 60% more detail, and the soundtrack is as atmospheric as ever!
